I'm an advanced Salesforce admin and occasional developer. 
It's been a while since I learned javacscript, html and css.  Nikhil does a great job of recapping what I need to know to build LWCs.  The other courses I've seen on Pluralsight and Udemy don't cover this.  Thanks for the great content & explanation, Nikhil.  I'm excited to learn more!

results.content: I noticed the Car Hub project was copied code directly from the eBikes project that was done in Salesforce Apps. I dont think this teacher should be copying other people's projects and marketing them as his own...at least showcase how you can take other people's ideas and then be different with them with your own code. Everything else is very informative in this class but the CHEATING/COPYING leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
results.content_html: I noticed the Car Hub project was copied code directly from the eBikes project that was done in Salesforce Apps. I dont think this teacher should be copying other people's projects and marketing them as his own...at least showcase how you can take other people's ideas and then be different with them with your own code. Everything else is very informative in this class but the CHEATING/COPYING leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
